## IDIDComm interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

DID Comm plugin interface for [Agent](./core.agent.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDIDComm extends IPluginMethodMap
```

<b>Extends:</b> [IPluginMethodMap](./core.ipluginmethodmap.md)

## Methods

| Method                                                                                     | Description                                                                                                                                                         |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [sendMessageDIDCommAlpha1(args, context)](./did-comm.ididcomm.sendmessagedidcommalpha1.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> This is used to create a message according to the initial [DIDComm-js](https://github.com/decentralized-identifier/DIDComm-js) implementation. |
